Test.Name: ptz6: Correct response
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response. Select ptz6 node on Management tab

Test.Name: ptz6(no Zoom): Correct response
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response.

Test.Name: Incorrect spaces in GetStatus
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-5-1-1 HOME POSITION OPERATIONS (CONFIGURABLE)
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Getting media service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Connect to media service Media service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Searching media profile with PTZ configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validating PTZ profile STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validating PTZ configuration options STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Moving pan/tilt to (-1, -1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace zoom to (0) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Waiting 10 seconds for camera to move STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Setting home position for profile [token=media_profile2] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Moving pan/tilt to (1, 1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace zoom to (1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Waiting 10 seconds for camera to move STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Going to home position for profile [token=media_profile2] Transmit done Receive done Waiting for 30 seconds for camera to come to home position. STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Waiting 10 seconds for camera to move STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Getting PTZ status Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Checking current pan/tilt and zoom position Current pan/tilt position (1,1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace1 Warning: Actual pan/tilt position differs from expected (-1,-1) Current zoom position (1) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace1 Warning: Actual zoom position differs from expected (0) STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: Fault on GotoHomePosition
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return fault on GotoHomePosition.

Test.Name: Fault on SetHomePosition
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return fault on SetHomePosition.

Test.Name: Correct Response for Not supported Absolute Move
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT return correct response when Absolute Move is not supported. Use Features.277 in Features_2.xml

Test.Name: Absolute and Relative Move are not supported
Test.Description: Check NVT SET AND GET PRESET test when DUT doesn't support Absolute Move and Relative Move. Define features with Features.290 in Features_2.xml
